messages.content: There are no zebra crossings at Baner Road, making it difficult and dangerous for pedestrians to cross.

Buses at MG Road are frequently delayed, causing long queues and increased traffic from private vehicles.

{"Category":"Parking Issues","Sub-category":"Double Parking"}

{"Category":"Public Transport","Sub-category":"Overcrowded Buses"}
There is no traffic police presence at Ring Road, leading to rule violations and congestion.
{"Category":"Traffic Management","Sub-category":"Lack of Traffic Police"}
The traffic signal at Bus Stand has not been working for days, resulting in unmanaged traffic.
{"Category":"Traffic Management","Sub-category":"Signal Not Working"}
